FILE: cm385645v11.0.txt
DYAD: NORWAY - IRAQ
RIVALRY: RIV1043
DISPUTE(S): MID3036 MID2833 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190314
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190318

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID3036 

TERRMID: MID3036 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID3036 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID3036 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID3036 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID3036 from Gibler 2018, Iraq attacked a Norwegian oil tanker carrying Iranian oil. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Iran-Iraq War, a territorial war in which each country attacked ships trading with the other country to harm their economy. 

MARITMID: MID3036 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID3036 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID3036 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID3036 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID3036 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID3036 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID3036 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3036 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID3036 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID3036 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID3036 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID3036 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID2833 

TERRMID: MID2833 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2833 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2833 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID2833 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2833 from Gibler 2018, Iraqi warplanes attacked a Norwegian vessel. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Iran-Iraq War, a territorial war in which each country attacked ships trading with the other country to harm their economy. Iran was a trading parter of Norway's at the time. 

MARITMID: MID2833 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2833 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2833 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2833 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2833 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2833 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2833 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2833 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2833 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2833 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2833 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2833 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES:
